com.camerontec.util.logger.hpl

Interface IHighPerformanceLoggerMXBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HighPerformanceLoggerFactory

    public interface IHighPerformanceLoggerMXBean
    Higher performance logger JMX management API.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearInternalMessages()
      Clear the current set of internal messages.
      int getbeaconInterval()
      Return the number of seconds of no log activity before a beacon log is emitted.
      String getconfigurationPath()
      Return the high performance logging configuration file path.
      String getdirectoryPath()
      Return the high performance log directory path.
      boolean getenabled()
      Return whether high performance logging is enabled.
      String[] getinternalMessages()
      Return the current set of internal messages (if any).
      Level getlevel()
      Return the default high performance logger level.
      String getlogAppenderClassName()
      Return the high performance appender class name.
      String getlogWriterClassName()
      Return the high performance log writer class name.
      long getmaxFileLength()
      Return the maximum length of any single high performance log file.
      int getminBufferEntrySize()
      Return the minimum high performance logger buffer entry size.
      int getminBufferSize()
      Return the minimum high performance logger asynchronous buffer size.
      String gettype()
      Return the high performance log type.

    • Method Detail

      • getenabled

        boolean getenabled()
        Return whether high performance logging is enabled.
        Returns:
        True if high performance logging is enabled, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        HighPerformanceLoggerConfiguration.getIsEnabled()

      • getinternalMessages

        String[] getinternalMessages()
        Return the current set of internal messages (if any).
        Returns:
        The current set of internal messages. Returns a zero length array when there are no messages.

      • clearInternalMessages

        void clearInternalMessages()
        Clear the current set of internal messages.

        This method has no effect if there are no internal messages.

      • getbeaconInterval

        int getbeaconInterval()
        Return the number of seconds of no log activity before a beacon log is emitted.
        Returns:
        The number of seconds of no log activity before a beacon log is emitted.
